name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience delivering high-performance web solutions using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **REST APIs**. Proficient in state management with **MobX** and adept in styling with **CSS**, **LESS**, and **SASS**, I have successfully contributed to dynamic web applications meeting scalability and performance objectives.

My background includes extensive experience in working with **AWS** and implementing containerization solutions using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. I excel in deploying robust applications in cloud environments, ensuring reliability and compliance with industry standards.

I have a strong commitment to code quality and continuous improvement, applying best practices in CI/CD automation and utilizing testing methodologies to drive project success. My experience is further enhanced with a solid understanding of NoSQL databases, enabling the efficient storage and retrieval of data in fast-paced environments.
